group.title: Key changes
group.item: Plugin uses Far API 2.0 and unicode.
64-bit version of the plugin is released. Now plugin is available both for x86 and x64.

Plugin has own open source project on google code: http://code.google.com/p/namedfolders/. You can write bugreports and suggestion to issue tracker here. You can also download most recent snapshot of the plugin (all releases will be send to PlugRing as previously).
NF3 doesn't work correctly with russian shortcuts, that were created on NF2. As result, it's necessary to recreate all shortcuts, that contain Russian letters in names and in paths.

group.title: Changes
group.item: Launch of x64-apps from FAR x86 is fixed, see #6 (http://code.google.com/p/namedfolders/issues/detail?id=6)

Procedure of removing douple prefixes is changed. In previous versions NF, command "cD:ab:command" was equal to "cd:command" and command "cd:cd:cd:command" didn't work at all. Now, the plugin ignores all prefixes except last one. So, the command "ab:cd:ef:command" is equal to "ef:command".
Search in local paths is changed. No, the command "cd:alias.." can be written in more classic way "cd:alias\..". Both variants ".." and "\.." are supported to specify parent folder.
New possibility to edit shortuct from variants menu. F4 is used to edit menu. To change view mode "shorctuts and values" on plese use F7 instead of F4.

version.item: If flag "subdirectories as aliases" is turned on, then plugin searches subfolders using mask "a*" (not "*a*" as previously).
If you copy directory on the plugin panel, dialog of alias creation appears. So, you are able to edit name of alias. In previous versions of the plugin, there was no possibility to make the edition.
Mode "Show all variants" didn't work.
Now ".." is used in local paths to specify "jump on one level above" (instead of "."). It allows to use char "." in masks, i.e. "cd:f\*.exe"
Search with local path can lead to path duplicates in list of path variants.
Shortcuts with characters "#", "@", "(", ")" in name didn't work.
Rename of "/@@" to "##" using Shift+F6 leaded to incorrect creation of catalog "##".
Plugin used fixed width of panel columns instead of taking width from settings.
Named folders with backslashes didn't work.
Fixed an error of the compilation - previous version of the plugin demands msvcp71.dll
The plugin uses fixed width (8,0) of columns on the panel instead of taking default values for widths

Add filter to all menus of variants. If you type "abc cde" in the menu, then menu will show only variants that contain "abc" AND "cde" in the path or name of alias. For typing local characters (i.e. russian) press SHIFT.

New configuration parameter "Use single menu mode". It specify the behavior of the "cd:a\b" commands. If this flag is set off, the plugin shows two menus: first for aliases "a*' and second for paths, available for the alias, selected by the user in the first menu. If this flag is set on, the plugin shows single menu with all paths available for all aliases.
Fixed bug with opening paths which contain russian letters.
Fixed bug in the command "cd: :soft" - russian letters in the path were stored in the clipboard in the wrong encoding.
It was not possible to set plugin's hotkey for the disk menu.
Buttons Ok and Cancel didn't work in the dialogs in new FAR (alpha 6).
Fixed bug with opening local paths that contain metacharacters
Fixed bug with appearing of double-slashes near the disk letter after coping directory to the plugins panel.
The plugin hangs on opening "net:\\abc" from the plugins panel in the new versions of FAR (alpha 6, build 2060).

New configuration parameter "Aliases mask expand mode". You can specify how to expand masks in the local paths. There are three possible variants: 0: a -> *a*. 1: a -> a*; 2: a -> a. For example, for "cd:x\a\*b\c": 0 - *a*\b*\*c*, 1 - a*\b*\c*, 2 - a\b*\c. Names a, b, c, which contain metacharacters, are not transformed.
There are two modes of the view in the variants menu of "cd: soft" now: with and without group name.

New macros "FastPrefix.reg" replaced "FastPanel.reg". New macros assign ":" as a hotkey to call the plugin's panel. It automatically switches current keyboard layout to the english one (FAR 1.7 alpha 6 is required)
Tree-like mode of catalog's showing was removed.
A state of named folders is checked in the Ctrl+8 panel mode only. So all other modes (i.e Ctrl+6) work faster now.

New configuration parameter "Subdirectories as aliases". When this mode is switched on, the command "cd:a" will search "a" in the list of aliases and in the list of subdirectories of the current directory. All subdirectories are displayed in the list of aliases as ".\abc".
Search files command (cf) was improved - the cursor of the FAR panel is set on the selected file now.
Patterns for commands - general mechanism to create short notations for frequently used commands of the plugin. See help for details.
Several bugs in the command cd:% were fixed
Command "cd: soft param" didn't work correctly, if the "param" was absolute path to the file.
Now you can stop search of the local paths by pressing Esc.

Now you can use two directions of the search in the mask of local directory. "\" is used to search in subdirectories, "." is used to search in parent directories. So you can use such masks as "cd:a\\path", "cd:a..path", "cd:a.*\path", etc. Note: "." is special symbol now, you should not use it in the names of shortcuts.
Now it's possible to make global search of local path (i.e. search without any restrictions of the nesting level). "cd:sh\*\ab" - search "down" "cd:sh.*.ab" - search "up"
Hotkeys were added to the settings dialog.
Fixed bugs with "Delete all" and "Skip".
The confirmation of deletion is common for deletion of the shortcuts and empty catalogs. There is individual confirmation for deletion of non-empty catalogs.
The dialog of execution now is not closed after unsuccessful execution of the command.
Implicit commands were not work correctly when the name of the catalog was specified (f.e, "cD::cat/")
New form of the command "cd:path" - "cd:.relativepath" (with point) - search "relativepath" relatively current directory.
New command "cd:--f sh\path" search files matched to "path" in the named directory "sh".
New command "cd:--df sh\path" search files and subdirectories matched to "path" in the named directory "sh"
New reg-files "cs.reg", "cf.reg", "cdf.reg","cc.reg" (see subdirectory Patterns) - patterns for commands "cd: :soft", "cd:--f ", "cd:--df ", "cd:.\"
Fixed bug in "cd:sh\\\path" - path was searched only on the last level, not on all three required levels (the bug was appeared in the case of the path without metacharacters).
New possibility to open shortcuts for network directories through Network plugin. It's useful in the case of network paths protected by the password. This feature is switched off by default.
Now the plugin "press" Ctrl+Y before open shortcut for virtual directory (to clear current command line content before sending there keys sequence).

New feature for command "cd: soft". If you place colon before soft "cd: :soft" then the plugin store path to current directory to the clipboard. It's useful, if you want to open an application and save then new file to directory, currently opened in the FAR. I.e. "cd: :word".
Now you can specify disk menu hotkey for Named Folders.

It's possible now to change the plugin's virtual panel view mode settings (only for default mode "Files owners", Ctrl+8). In the plugin's configuration set value for "panel mode" like this: "N,Z,C0;10,0,5" (columns through commas, semicolon, widths for columns).

group.title: Functionality
group.item: Now it's possible to execute "cd: soft" with parameters. Selected application will be executed with these parameters. Example: "cd: word abc.txt" (to open file "abc.txt" in MsWord)"
Now minimum system requirements for Named Folders are Win9X/WinNT + IE4.0. The plugin was tested under Win98SE.
New command "cd:path". "Path" must be absolute local path. So, you can use local drive's letters as shortcuts. Example: "cd:z:\\a*"
New TODO page on the Names Folders's site: http://www.rammus.ru/?tag=nf_todo
Now it's possible to delete all selected shortcuts without unnecessary confirmations (DeleteAll button was added).
Now "cd:abc:sh" with two or more letters in abc is equivalent to "cd:sh".

group.title: Fixed bugs
group.item: Error with creation of the folders with russian names was fixed.
Names of folders with ampersands in the names were not correctly displayed in the selection menu. Fixed.
Masks with "[]" didn't work when they contain no more metachars and "[]" contains two or more characters. Fixed. Example: С:\Tasks\[TD]o[dn][oe].
Now "cd:path" is executed as "cd:*path*" if there are no metacharacters in the path and as "cd:path*" otherwise. I.e. you can search now paths by first letters in their names.
Fixed several bugs with positioning cursor after creation folders and refreshing.

group.title: Functionality
group.item: Now you can set named folders path in the form "%environment variable%\related path". E.g. "%windir%\system32".
Now you can omit asterix after last slash in the local path. I.e. "cd:pf\" is equal "cd:pf"

group.title: Fast launching problems
group.item: In the command "cd: soft" you can set now "soft" in the form "group mask\shortcuts mask". E.g. "cd: adobe\*" will find all shortcuts in all groups which names is matched to "*adobe*"
Bug with ANSI/OEM characters in the list of ignored masks for "cd: soft" was fixed
Switching between ignore-on/off modes in the variants menu leaded to closing of menu

group.title: Virtual panel
group.item: It wasn't possible to type R in the command line with opened plugins panel.
Fixed several bugs with positioning cursor after creation (Shift+F4) and copying/moving (F5/F6) of shortcuts.

group.title: Fast launching programms
group.item: New possibility to set in the configurations list of mask of shortcuts which should be ignored.
New reg-file "SoftIgnoreMasks.reg" with several common masks which should be ignored (*Uninstall*, *readme* and *read me*)
Two modes of variants menu: with hidden ignored shortcuts and with not hidden. In the last mode there is an asterix in the title of menu.
Didn't work fast launching of Excel and Word
Now function of fast launching should work under all versions of Windows.
Now it's possible to open directory for selected shortcut from variants menu. Use Shift+Enter to open directory in Far and Ctrl+Enter to open it in Explorer
The paths of shortcuts now is displayed as short as possible (equal path for all variants are not displayed)

group.title: Misc
group.item: Fixed bug with creation of catalogs.
Fixed several bugs with converting between OEM and ANSI.
Fixed bug with copying directory to plugins panel (the plugin losts slash between directory name and its path)
Now an asterix in the title of variants menu is displayed in tree-like mode.
List of appropriated paths in variants menu now is sorted
Fixed an error with pressing of BACKSPACE on the virtual panel

group.title: Sources
group.item: From this versions source codes of Named Folders will not be included in distributive on PlugRing. You can get them if you want on the site of the plugin: http://www.rammus.ru
Several XSLT and XML files for autogeneration of help and readme files were included in source codes.

group.title: Fast launching programs
group.item: New command "cd: soft" (prefix, space, pattern) for launching programs from Start menu. The plugin search all programs shortcuts with names matched to "*soft*" (or to "soft" if "soft" is already mask), suggest a list of all matched shortcuts to user and launch selected shortcut.
New command is experimental. Please send your comments and suggestions.

group.title: Support of OEM and ANSI
group.item: Didn't work shortcuts with local chars in the names.
Shortcuts to the registry key didn't allow to jump to the folders with local chars in the path.

group.title: Misc
group.item: Didn't work jumping to the nearest directory.
Shortcuts for paths like "c:\", "d:\", etc didn't work.
The states of shortcuts with metacharacters in their paths were incorrectly displayed as "Not found".
Now it's possible to freely use "/" instead of "\" in the paths of local named folders.

version.item: Shortcuts to folders with symbols [] in the paths didn't work.
In the Far 1.7 alpha 6 if you opened not exist shortcut and specify any local path, the plugin show list of subfolders of the current folder.
Now, you can directly specify the name of required registry value for shortcut to registry key. I.e. You can use "cd:stdu\co" to jump to "cookies".

group.title: Support of metacharacters in paths
group.item: Now it's possible to set the depth of the searching in the paths of local named folders and in the related paths. The depth of the searching are regulated by the number of slashes. N slashes mean: "search folder among all folders with nesting level less or equal N. I.e.: "b\a" - search "a" among subfolders of "b" "b\\a" - search "a" among subfolders of "b" and their subfolders. etc.

Now it's possible to use FAR's metacharacters (?, * and [a-b, z]) in the named folders paths. Scope of "*" is NOT spreaded to the subfolders. You should explicitly specify the depth of the searching by the number of slashes.

Useful examples: - Now you can specify single shortcut for all "Program Files" folders "pf" = "?:\Program Files" or "[c-d, f]:\Program Files". - There is new fast method to jump to the folder, located somewhere in the named folder: "cd:pf\office", "cd:pf\\vc", "cd:pf\\delphi", "cd:pf\\\atl" etc.

group.title: Support of the system directories
group.item: Now you can specify the registry key as a path of named folder: "$HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\Software..." (first character must be "$"). For such named folder the plugin will look through the values of this key, find all values, which contains paths to exists folders and will allow to user select one of these folders.
Such feature allows us to get access to all system folders (like "My documents", "History", "Favorites" etc) through the single shortcut.
New file "StdPaths.reg" was added to Named Folders distributive. This file create shortcuts "stda" and "stdu" for system folders (for all users and current user correspondingly).

group.title: Variants menu
group.item: Variants menu was improved. Now you can view catalogs in two modes: standard and pseudo-treelike :). Switch them by F11.

group.title: Misc
group.item: Method of opening shortcuts for two directories was improved. Now the plugin always open first directory on the left panel, and the second one on the right panel. It doesn't matter which panel is currently active. If you open shortcut with pressed Ctrl, first directory will be opened on the right panel and so on.
Shift+Del delete catalogs and shortcuts.

version.item: Now it's possible to use ":" as the prefix of the plugin.
Now you can save current view mode of the plugin's panel as default one by Shift+F9.

The command "cd:%var" was changed. Now, "var" will be located not only in the names of environment variables, but also in their paths. So, the command "cd:%32", for example, will show "c:\windows\system32" (from "path").
The bug with "&" now is removed completely.

group.title: General
group.item: Now you can view state of local directories (exists, partly exists or not found) in the "File owners" (Ctrl+8) view mode.
The plugin didn't work correctly if the named folders with the "&" in the path was selected.

group.title: Variants menu
group.item: Menu was divided on the collumns.
In the menu with environment variables it's possible now to view variables names.

group.title: Command line
group.item: Now display mode in the shortcuts menu is stored always.
The command "cd::+shortcut" worked incorrectly.
The command "cd::catalog/shortcut" didn't work.

group.title: Configuration dialog
group.item: Tab order was corrected.
The option "hide temporary shortcuts" was returned.
Plugin's prefix wasn't saved.

New command: "cd:%var%" to open directory specified in the environment variable "var"; if this variable contains several paths (separated by ";"), the plugin allows to select required path from the list. Incomplete syntax of command is supported: for example, you can use "cd:%p" instead of "cd:%path%".

group.title: Virtual panel
group.item: Several errors with incorrect positioning of the cursor on the FAR panel after operations of renaming and deleting were corrected.
In the Far alpha 6 it wasn't possible to go to the parent catalog through ".."
New type of named folder: now you can specify environment variable as path to the named folder in the form of "%var%".
Character-separator between paths for active and inactive panels in the path of named folders was changed from "\n" to "|".

group.title: Misc
group.item: The plugin was failed after cancellation of the submenu in the plugins menu.
Help and lang files were corrected.

group.title: General
group.item: Catalogs are supported now.
Filters were removed.
If a shortcut to a non-existing folder is selected, the plugin will suggest to go to the nearest existing folder in the shortcut path.
Now the site of this plugin are http://www.rammus.ru

group.title: Virtual panel
group.item: F7 is opened the dialog for creation catalog.
The copping any directory to the virtual panel of the plugin will lead to the implicit creation of the shortcut.
It's possible to copy and remove catalogs and shortcuts through F5 and F6.
Now previous view mode of the virtual panel is restored automatically.

group.title: Command line
group.item: Now it's possible to use metasymbols * and ? in the names of shortcuts, catalogs and paths.
Now in the commands of opening and deleting the names of shortcut in the general case writing as [catalog/][shortcut][\path related named folder].

New commands to create shortcut for two folders. Commands "cd:::shortcut" and "cd::+shortcut" will create, accordingly, constant and temporary shortcut for two folders, opened on active and inactive panels.
New commands for implicit creation of shortcuts: "cd::", "cd:+", "cd:::", "cd::+". As the name of shortcut the name of the opened directory will be used.

New command for implicit deletion of the shortcut: "cd:-". This command display menu with the list of shortcuts for currently opened and directory and its subdirectories. Selected shortcut will be deleted.
New command for finding shortcut by the text included in the path of named folder: "cd:~mask".

Now it's possible to execute any command through "Command execution dialog" (F11 -> Named Folders 2.0 -> Execute command). In contrast to command line, it's possible to skip plugins prefix "cd:" in this case. File "ApplyCommand.reg" is allowed to set hot key "Ctrl+D" for this dialog.
Now it's possible to search shortcuts by Alt+F7.

group.title: Settings
group.item: New confirmations for overriding existing shortcut, deleting catalogs and shortcuts, going to the nearest folder, creating and deleting shortcut implicitly.

New flag "always show all variants" which define the behavior of the plugin in the case, when several shortcuts satisfied to specified mask but only one of them satisfied exactly. I.e. user type shortcut name "a" and plugin find shortcuts "a" and "ab". If this flag is ON plugin will display menu with both variants, otherwise plugin will open shortcut "a".

group.title: Misc
group.item: Now the registry key for saving shortcuts are dependent from the user of FAR. (Previously the plugin save all data to HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Far\Plugins\NamedFolders)
Now the plugin has two default prefixes: "cd" and "cc"
